Opening and closing a device
-------------------------

```{r}
dev.new(); dev.new(); dev.new()
dev.list()
dev.cur()
dev.set(3)
dev.set(dev.next())
dev.off()
graphics.off()
```

Saving plots to a graphics file
-------------------------

```{r eval=FALSE}
pdf("pdf_test.pdf")
plot(1:10, rnorm(10))
dev.off()
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
plot(1:10, rnorm(10))
dev.copy(jpeg, filename="copied.jpg", quality=90)
graphics.off()
```
